article: sinn fein leader gerry adams said thursday he wants to meet with the commanders of three anti-british paramilitary groups and persuade them to abandon violence and disarm , the path already taken by most irish republican army members .
abstract: sinn fein chief wants to meet dissident ira groups persuade them to end violence
